title: nAmAmi shrI satya
sahitya:
nAmAmi shrI satya vijaya svAmiku rOsagala shiSya kalpatarO


anupallavi

  kamala nayana rAmacandra pAdAbja makaranda pAnAnanda 
kara kalita bhanUpama daNDadhara cakra gihana shObhita bAhu daNDa


caraNam    shrI tirumala nrpa karArcitapada hEma kASAyatara madhura 
suvacana suguNa sadana mrduLa caraNa sakala patita jana bhayahara 
suhrdaya guruvara nArAyaNa smaraNa sanAbha vana tulasImaNi hAra 
vibhUSaNa ghOra vyAdi hara sadAshiva kavi sankaTahara lOkAbhISTakara
